target.name: build.modules
target.depends: init, clean, compile.module.emailer, compile.module.servletframework, compile.module.woserver, compile.module.main

target.name: build.all.artifacts
target.depends: artifact.emailer:jar, artifact.servletframework:jar, artifact.woserver_war_cadmium, artifact.woserver_war_rose, artifact.woserver_war_sugaree, artifact.woserver:war, artifact.woserver:war_exploded, artifact.woserver:webforcadmium_exploded, artifact.woserver:webforlocalhost_exploded, artifact.woserver:webforrose_exploded, artifact.woserver:webforsugaree_exploded

target.name: ZipMathspringApacheResources
target.description: Build a zip of Apache resources

target.name: DeployRoseWar
target.description: Build the woj.war file for rose

target.name: DeployRoseWarWithoutContent
target.description: Build the woj.war file for rose

target.name: DeploySugareeWar
target.description: Build the woj.war file for sugaree

target.name: GetMsContentFlash
target.description: Gets the Flash mscontent and removes FLA files

target.name: GetMsContentHTML
target.description: Gets the HTML mscontent and removes FLA files

target.name: GetMsContent
target.description: Gets the Flash and HTML from mscontent and removes FLA files
